roleset.name: Awake, Alert and Oriented (part of a neuro exam)

role.descr: oriented to (some number out of 3, usually "x3" or such)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SHARP. Relation to aa.01.

example.name: both args
example.note: "x 3" means "oriented to 3 of the following things: person, place and time."
